code: import React from'react';import{Pagination}from'./Styled';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var PaginationV2=function PaginationV2(_ref){var pageNumber=_ref.pageNumber,setPageNumber=_ref.setPageNumber,totalPageCount=_ref.totalPageCount,hasPrev=_ref.hasPrev,hasNext=_ref.hasNext;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Pagination,{$disablePrev:!hasPrev,$disableNext:!hasNext,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"prevStep",onClick:function onClick(){return hasPrev&&setPageNumber(pageNumber-1);},children:['<'," Prev"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nextStep",onClick:function onClick(){return hasNext&&setPageNumber(pageNumber+1);},children:["Next ",'>']})]});};export default PaginationV2;
